metadata.title: USN-3474-1 -- Liblouis vulnerability
metadata.description: Raphael Sanchez Prudencio discovered that Liblouis incorrectly handled certain files. If a user were tricked into opening a crafted file, an attacker could possibly use this to cause a denial of service or potentially execute arbitrary code.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-3474-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  liblouis-bin - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2 liblouis2 - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2 python-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2 liblouis-dev - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2 python3-louis - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2 liblouis-data - 2.5.3-2ubuntu1.2 No subscription required
